title: Religion History Sheet
description: Tracks the historical events of a religion from founding through present day, including prophetic figures, major events, schisms, and current status.

religion_id.description: The religion this history belongs to

prophetic_figure.description: Name and key facts about the founding prophet

prophet_death.description: How the prophet died and the consequences (martyrdom, enemies, artifacts)

major_events.description: Major historical events in the religion's history

saints_and_figures.description: Saints, prophets, betrayers, and important figures

schisms.description: Schisms and sects that broke away

current_status.description: Current state of the religion (growing, declining, stable, underground)

how_religions_die.description: What threatens survival -- people stop believing, state collapses taking state religion with it, supplanted by another religion, foretold event fails to occur, practitioners find faith too hard or teachings too confusing
